what research (or clinical trials) is being done for Alpers' Disease ?,"The NINDS supports research on gene-linked neurodegenerative disorders such as Alpers' disease. The goals of this research are to increase scientific understanding of these disorders, and to find ways to prevent, treat, and cure them.",NINDS,Alpers' Disease
